```{python}
import sympy as sy
import sympy.vector as sv

N = sv.CoordSys3D('N')
t = sy.Symbol('t', real = True)
x = sy.Symbol('x', real = True)
y = sy.Symbol('y', real = True)
z = sy.Symbol('z', real = True)
r = sy.Symbol('r', real = True)
s = sy.Symbol('s', real = True)
theta = sy.Symbol('theta', real = True)
phi = sy.Symbol('phi', real = True)
rho = sy.Symbol('rho', real = True)
```

## Question 3

```{python}
curve1 = sv.ParametricRegion((2-t, t, 0), (t, 0, 2))
curve2 = sv.ParametricRegion((0, 2-t, t), (t, 0, 2))
curve3 = sv.ParametricRegion((t, 0, 2-t), (t, 0, 2))
F = 2*N.y*N.i + 3*N.z*N.j + N.x*N.k

sv.vector_integrate(F, curve1) + sv.vector_integrate(F, curve2) + sv.vector_integrate(F, curve3)

surface = sv.ParametricRegion((x,y,2-x-y), (y, 0, 2-x), (x, 2, 0))

sv.vector_integrate(sv.curl(F), surface)

sv.curl(F)
```
